title.rendered: LAWS program celebrates five years of putting at-risk students at the ‘head of the class’

content.rendered: LAWS is celebrating five years of successfully improving the school attendance, grades, engagement and future outlook of its participants.

excerpt.rendered: LAWS is celebrating five years of successfully improving the school attendance, grades, engagement and future outlook of its participants.
